name: POST http://127.0.0.1:5000/course/add_course
body:
{
    "id_client": "your_client_id_here",
    "id_course_location": "your_course_location_id_here", 
    "name": "Advanced Python for Data Science",
    "description": "A comprehensive course covering advanced Python topics relevant to data science, including machine learning libraries, data visualization, and deployment.",
    "price": 499.99,
    "info": "This course is designed for individuals with a basic understanding of Python who want to delve deeper into data science applications. It includes practical projects and expert-led sessions.",
    "photo": "data:image/jpeg;base64,", 
    "arranged_by": "EduFlex Learning",
    "kelas": "PYDS-201",
    "task_description": "Develop a sentiment analysis model using a given dataset. The model should achieve at least 85% accuracy and include a Flask API for deployment.",
    "task_time": "2024-09-01T23:59:59Z", 
    "task_punishment": "Failure to submit or achieve the minimum accuracy will result in a 'needs improvement' status for the module.",
    "is_ojt": 0, 
    "price_bisaai": 599.99, 
    "price_discount": 50.00, 
    "is_discount": 1, 
    "id_master_sertifikat": 1,
    "point": 100 
}
